Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Louis's life prior to or as the outbreak began, except that he had a mother , father , and sister .
Death[]: Killed By Unknown Cause It's mentioned that Morales' whole family was killed. It's not known how Louis died.
Trivia[]: Louis is the only named character of the Atlanta camp who was never credited as a guest star or co-star.
Name: Louis Morales
